name: Godzilla
overview: Godzilla (ゴジラ Gojira) is a game for the NEC PC-9800 series developed by SystemSoft and released in August 1993. The game's opening shows a backstory to Godzilla (a summary of the events of the original Godzilla 1954 film). The gameplay shows this to be a point and click game. In the game you must face off with 14 kaiju and overcome and survive them.
